body_html:
@x10000year
It seems to me that this is impossible.

You can try to modify the implementation of tf::LoadSavedModel from
https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/cc/saved_model/loader.cc

With the modification of GraphDef from my post, before the session is created, you should get what you intended.
body_text:
@x10000year
It seems to me that this is impossible.
You can try to modify the implementation of tf::LoadSavedModel from
https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/cc/saved_model/loader.cc
With the modification of GraphDef from my post, before the session is created, you should get what you intended.
body:
@x10000year 
It seems to me that this is impossible.

You can try to modify the implementation of tf::LoadSavedModel from 
[https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/cc/saved_model/loader.cc](url)

With the modification of `GraphDef` from my post, before the session is created, you should get what you intended.
